text: The 2015 Sacramento State Hornets football team represented California State University, Sacramento in the 2015 NCAA Division I FCS football season. They were led by second-year head coach Jody Sears and played their home games at Hornet Stadium. They were a member of the Big Sky Conference. They finished the season 2–9, 1–7 in Big Sky play to finish in a tie for 12th place. ==Schedule== Despite also being a member of the Big Sky Conference, the game with Weber State on September 19 is considered a non conference game. ==Game summaries== ===Eastern Oregon=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" !
